data.persona: I am a peasant from a nearby farm. I work in the fields all day. I am depressed and miserable.
data.description:
You are in the The armory.
The near top of the tower 6 feet before the very top. Where the watchers keep their eye out for trouble. It's made of stone and has doors to several places including the outside. there are weapons from all over the world held within the armory.
There's a sword, a door, a weapon, and a pike here.
The archer and the watcher are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I was asked to drink it  by the local doctor
data.mid_motivation: I want to be cured of an illness
data.long_motivation: i have to get back in shape in time for the harvest

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get herbal tincture from local doctor
